text: - We strive to be the analytics database

for the most ambitious
organizations in the world.
To live up to that vision,

we work every day to make
sure that our high performance
in-memory database

is available to every
part of the enterprise,

to drive value and
outcome for the business.

It is that drive for
continuous improvement
that has led us onto the SaaS journey.

Embracing the SaaS
delivery model has required
a true transformation at Exasol.

Customer obsession is at
the core of our values
and what we do.
So we've had to integrate Exasol

into a new SaaS platform
to enable our customers,
to be able to experience the fastest
in-memory analytics database.

They can manage the cost
on a pay-as-you-go model,
pay for as much as you use.

They can scale with
more data and more users
as and when they need it,

there's no limits on
the scaling capability.

It also means that we're
very fast to deploy.

So the speed of deployment
matches the speed of query.

The SaaS Factory Team
were absolutely invaluable
in supporting us through the journey.
They provided us advice on best practice,
the best approach to market,

they advised us on structure,
business model incentives,

and lead-ins, and they
kept on driving us forward
to achieve our mutual ambition.

The Migration Program
is very important for us
because it enables our customers to move

from on-prem to cloud, and we
bridge that journey for them.

But it also means that
we can use AWS Credits

to enable them to get a proof
of concept off the ground,

to help them understand what
that journey looks like.
The ISV Program is very important for us

because it enables us to
engage with sellers in regions
such as North America,

AWS Sellers are more open
to working with AWS Partners

because they know that they
are the top selected partners
globally with trusted technology.
And this provides more credibility
for Exasol in the marketplace.
Our engagement with the SaaS Factory Team

and the programs associated
with it enables us

to accelerate our customer's
journey into the cloud.

This is a great combination,
a great partnership,
that brings real value to our customers.
(upbeat music)
